faqs.question: Which Macallan expressions do you buy?
faqs.answer: We buy Macallan 18 Year and older, Fine and Rare bottles, Lalique decanters, Edition Series, and other limited or collectible releases. Standard 12 Year expressions typically do not meet our criteria.

faqs.question: Do you buy Macallan Lalique decanters?
faqs.answer: Yes. We buy all Macallan Lalique editions. Decanter and stopper condition is important, as is the presence of the original presentation box.

faqs.question: How do I know the value of my Macallan?
faqs.answer: Submit photos and details through our form or by text. We will evaluate based on expression, condition, packaging, and current market demand, then provide a specific offer.

faqs.question: Does the original box add value?
faqs.answer: Yes. Original boxes, tubes, and presentation cases add significant value for Macallan. For Lalique editions, the presentation box is particularly important.

faqs.question: What condition issues affect Macallan values?
faqs.answer: Fill level, seal integrity, and label condition are key factors. Original packaging completeness also matters. Minor wear may reduce value but usually does not disqualify.

faqs.question: How quickly will I get an offer?
faqs.answer: We typically respond within one business day. Macallan bottles are in demand, so we prioritize these submissions.

faqs.question: Do you buy vintage Macallan bottles?
faqs.answer: Yes. Older and vintage Macallan bottles are often collectible. Send photos and details and we will evaluate based on age, condition, and current demand.

faqs.question: Is my Macallan authentic?
faqs.answer: We review photos for authenticity indicators and conduct full verification during physical inspection. If you have concerns, include them in your submission.
